channel.title: Home on Alice Lai
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Alice Lai

item.title: I like to roar
item.description: Hi, quick update from me. I just want to let everyone know that I like roaring.

item.title: Today I made friends
item.description: I got lost in the woods today. Two friends, a Meerkat and a Warthog, found me, sung a song with me and gave my life new meaning. Today was a good day.

item.title: Vegan experiment
item.description: I tried to become a vegan today. I made it to lunch time and couldn’t bear the sight of another green leaf. Yuck!

item.title: About
item.description:
currently

I am a researcher in Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing working on AI/ML for social good and public policy issues with Rayid Ghani at CMU.

previously

I worked on digital assistants for the medical domain as a Machine Learning Engineer at 3M, and on writing assistance tools for Word with Chris Quirk as an Applied Scientist at Microsoft. My work in industry has included collecting data to fine-tune large transformer models, applying knowledge distillation to produce fast and accurate models for production, and developing compact task-specific representations to improve model efficiency.
